Package com.company.businessLayer

Interface IRestaurantProcessing

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Restaurant
    public interface IRestaurantProcessing
    Interface used to describe the interaction between the Restaurant class and the GUI classes.

        Used to edit the properties of a menuItem
        Parameters:

        newName - String representing the new name of the product
        newPrice - double representing the new price of the product
